Daemon rucio-conveyor-submitter¶

usage: rucio-conveyor-submitter [-h] [--run-once]
                                [--total-threads TOTAL_THREADS] [--bulk BULK]
                                [--group-bulk GROUP_BULK]
                                [--group-policy GROUP_POLICY] [--mock]
                                [--fts-source-strategy FTS_SOURCE_STRATEGY]
                                [--exclude-rses EXCLUDE_RSES]
                                [--include-rses INCLUDE_RSES]
                                [--rses RSES [RSES ...]]
                                [--activities ACTIVITIES [ACTIVITIES ...]]
                                [--sleep-time SLEEP_TIME]
                                [--max-sources MAX_SOURCES]
                                [--retry-other-fts]

Named Arguments¶

--run-once

One iteration only

Default: False

--total-threads
 

Concurrency control: total number of threads per process

Default: 1

--bulk

Bulk control: number of requests

Default: 100

--group-bulk

Group control: number of requests per group

Default: 1

--group-policy

Group control: policy used to group. enum{rule, dest, src_dest, rule_src_dest, activity_dest, activity_src_dest}

Default: “rule”

--mock

Fake source replicas for requests

Default: False

--fts-source-strategy
 

FTS source strategy

Default: “auto”

--exclude-rses RSE expression to exclude
--include-rses RSE expression to include
--rses Explicit list of RSEs to include
--activities Explicit list of activities to include
--sleep-time

Seconds to sleep if few requests

Default: 600

--max-sources

Maximum source replicas per FTS job

Default: 4

--retry-other-fts
 

retry on a different FTS

Default: False
